about_the_game:
This game is independently developed by the author in his spare time after work, so please go easy on any criticism.

This is a game where you can choose different heroes to occupy territory.

There are currently 4 heroes, each with their own unique skills.

In each battle, you choose one hero to enter a fixed number of grid scenes. Use the hero's skills (keys 1, 2, 3, etc.) to attack the grid and monsters in the scene.

Different monsters will randomly appear on the grid to prevent you from occupying it!!! They will use their skills to reclaim the grid from you.

Try to have fun using different skills to occupy the territory.

If you have any good suggestions for modifications, please feel free to comment and leave a message.
Or join the QQ group to discuss together: 907462326

name: Grid Territory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Use skills to attack monsters, occupy grids, expand your influence, and win battles!
